item.title: The Best Queer Books of 2025, According to the New York Public Library
item.description: The New York Public Library has just released its picks for the best books of 2025. Here are the queer books that made the cut.

item.title: 2026 Retellings That Should Be on Your Radar
item.description: Get ready to fill your TBR with these 2026 retellings of everything from Moby-Dick and Sleeping Beauty to Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.

item.title: What to Read if You Love Bridgerton
item.description: Whether you're in it for the slow-burn tension or the sharp social commentary, here's what to read if you love Bridgerton.

item.title: The Best New Book Releases Out November 25, 2025
item.description: There's domestic horror (one in D.C. suburbs, the other the Philippines), a witch/demon queer romance, and messy coworker fanfics
